name: Raise Animal Companion
components: V, S, M (a diamond worth 1,000 gp)
target: dead animal companion or bonded mount
text: This spell functions as raise dead, but it only affects an animal companion, familiar, or paladin’s bonded mount.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 材料 (价值1000gp的钻石)
target_zh: 死亡的动物伙伴或者神契坐骑
text_zh: 该法术如同死者复活 (raise dead) 一般作用，但是只对动物伙伴、魔宠或圣骑士的神契坐骑生效。
